attributes.action: A pay rise for all Health Professionals who have been front line during Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: Allied Health Professionals and other professions listed have all been vital in the fight against Covid-19. Since Covid-19 began Paramedics, Nurses, HCA's, Midwives, and Firefighters have been responding and treating patients on an unprecedented scale. The challenges have been immense and we have been seeing more patients than ever before. Hospital cleaners have also been a vital component. We need a fair pay rise in line with the rest of the 900,000 key workers.
attributes.background: A fair pay rise for all front line staff that have dealt with Covid-19, including but not limited to, Paramedics and other ambulance staff, Nurses, Health Care Assistants, Midwives, Hospital Cleaners, and Fire Fighters. All of the above have been vital in the fight against Covid-19.
